about.title: About me
about.description1: Hi, I'm Sarah and I live in the Dolomites! I am a dynamic and curious person and this has led me to explore many things, in the end I decided that Yoga was my path. I firmly believe that in this society people need to reconnect with themselves, with nature and with their breath.
about.description2: I started practicing Yoga in 2016 and I immediately fell in love with it. It was a period of overthinking and during the hours of Yoga I managed not to think for a whole hour, almost like magic.
about.description3: After raving to anyone about its benefits (I still do), I decided to undertake teacher training in Milan. I trained with the Samadhi school, which founded Anukalana Yoga.
about.extended_description1: I teach yoga in Cortina d'Ampezzo, Belluno, Ponte nelle Alpi, and throughout the Cadore region (Tai di Cadore, Vodo di Cadore, Calalzo). I offer group classes in studios and personalized private sessions, both in-person and online.
about.extended_description2: I am certified in Anukalana Yoga (Samadhi School Milan) and also specialized in Yin Yoga, Kids Yoga, and Pilates. My mission is to help people rediscover balance, wellbeing, and connection with themselves through the practice of yoga.
about.extended_description3: During summer I organize outdoor yoga sessions in stunning Dolomites locations, including BAR ALPINO in Calalzo di Cadore, Malga Caseera Razzo in Vigo, and after mountain hikes at various rifugi. I'm also available for private events and yoga retreats.

anukalana.title: Anukalana Yoga
anukalana.description_long: Anukalana means integration, in fact it is a style that combines many notions: obviously Asana, Pranayama, Meditations, but also myofascia, meridians and energy centers. It bases movements on fluidity, coordination with the breath and gentleness. What fascinated me most about this style is that it is suitable for everyone. It is not competitive, but truly aimed at the well-being of each individual.
anukalana.description: Integrated practice combining asana, pranayama, meditation and fascia/movement work. Gentle, breathâ€‘led sequences that focus on fluidity and overall wellbeing.

yin.title: Yin Yoga
yin.description_long: Yin yoga is a slow-paced style of yoga in which poses are held for longer periods of time than in more active styles. We will get comfortable with cushions called 'bolsters', yoga blocks, and whatever else is needed to make the asanas comfortable and perfectly suited to everyone's needs and flexibility. The purpose of yin yoga is to stimulate the connective tissue, applying optimal tension for a certain time and maintaining deep breathing. By doing this, the connective tissue lengthens, strengthens, and slowly opens up, creating more space between the joints, improving their movement and making them more solid, stable, and strong, and increasing muscle flexibility.
yin.description: Slow passive postures aided by props. Usefull to stimulate connective tissue, increse joint mobility, encourage deep breathing and restorative release for body and mind.

kids.title: Kid's Yoga
kids.description_long: Getting children involved in Yoga is very important nowadays. The Bimbiyoga method has a playful and fun approach to capture children's attention. We will explore the Asanas through stories, songs, and games. There will also be moments of listening, awareness, and small meditations.
kids.description: Playful, creative sessions using stories, songs and games to teach asanas, breath awareness and mindful listening while building confidence and calm.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: For any information do not hesitate to contact me! You can write me an email or contact me on social media.
contact.name: Full Name

locations.title: Where I Teach
locations.subtitle: Yoga classes in Cortina, Belluno and throughout Cadore

belluno.title: Yoga in Belluno
belluno.subtitle: Anukalana, Vinyasa and Yin Yoga classes
belluno.description: I regularly teach in Belluno with several weekly classes of Anukalana, Vinyasa, and Yin Yoga. Classes are held in welcoming studios and are suitable for all levels, from beginners to advanced students.

cortina.title: Yoga in Cortina d'Ampezzo and Cadore
cortina.subtitle: Studio and outdoor classes in the Dolomites
cortina.description: In Cortina d'Ampezzo and the Cadore region (Vodo di Cadore, Tai di Cadore, Calalzo) I offer weekly Anukalana Yoga classes and special outdoor sessions during summer. Also available for private events and yoga retreats in stunning Dolomites locations.

outdoor.title: Outdoor Yoga
outdoor.subtitle: Summer sessions in the open air in the Dolomites
outdoor.hero_subtitle: Practice yoga outdoors in the mountains
outdoor.description1: During summer months I organize outdoor yoga sessions in some of the most stunning locations in the Dolomites. Practicing yoga immersed in nature amplifies the benefits of the practice, fostering a deep connection with the surrounding environment.
outdoor.description2: Outdoor sessions are open to all levels and include Anukalana, Vinyasa practices, and guided meditations. A unique experience to rejuvenate body and mind.
outdoor.location1_desc: Morning sessions with Dolomites views in a welcoming and panoramic location.
outdoor.location2_desc: High-altitude yoga surrounded by alpine pastures, an experience of total connection with nature.
outdoor.location3_desc: Special events at mountain huts and after hikes in the Cortina, Belluno, and Cadore areas.
outdoor.cta: Interested in outdoor sessions? Contact me to learn about the summer schedule!

private.title: Private Lessons
private.subtitle: Personalized sessions online and in-person
private.description1: I offer personalized private yoga lessons both in-person (Cortina, Belluno, Cadore) and online. Each session is designed around your specific needs, whether you're a beginner or advanced practitioner.
private.description2: Private lessons are ideal for those who want individual attention, have specific goals (flexibility, strength, relaxation), or prefer to practice in a private setting.
private.benefit2: Flexible scheduling to fit your commitments
private.benefit3: Individual attention on posture and alignment
private.benefit5: Available online from wherever you are
private.cta: Contact me to book your private lesson!
